description.value:
Prerequisite: Shadar-kai, shadow jaunt racial power, artificer, Healing Infusion class feature

Benefit: If you have not yet used your shadow jaunt power during the encounter, an ally benefiting from your resistive formula or your shielding elixir can end the effect as a free action to gain insubstantial until the start of his or her next turn. This benefit replaces the power's normal effect.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 34.
